description: transfer cloud drive to local drive

script: Start-Process powershell "new-service 每Name CloudDriveService 每DisplayName CloudDriveService 每BinaryPathName $dir\CloudDriveService.exe 每StartupType Automatic;Start-Service -Name CloudDriveService" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden
Start-Process cmd -Args '/c', "sc stop CloudDriveService & sc delete CloudDriveService" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden
